document_data.name: Hurl Thunderbolt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hurl thunderbolt''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] used only by specialty priests devoted to [[Gilgeam]] called [[Martinet]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a Martinet to hurl a lightning bolt from their upraised [[holy symbol]] toward a single target. In addition to electrifying the target, the bolt unleashed a clap of thunder upon striking the target, temporarily deafening anyone within {{SI|30|ft}} of the target.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the Martinet's holy symbol to cast.
